name: remotion-animations
description: A library of ready-made animations for Remotion

scripts.render: npx remotion render src/index.ts SubscribeButton out/subscribe-button.webm --codec vp9 --pixel-format yuva420p
scripts.render:gif: npx remotion render src/index.ts SubscribeButton out/subscribe-button.gif --codec gif
scripts.render:mp4: npx remotion render src/index.ts SubscribeButton out/subscribe-button.mp4 --codec h264 --pixel-format yuv420p
scripts.render:text-animation-1: npx remotion render src/index.ts TextAnimation1 out/text-animation-1.webm --codec vp9 --pixel-format yuva420p
scripts.render:text-animation-1:gif: npx remotion render src/index.ts TextAnimation1 out/text-animation-1.gif --codec gif
scripts.render:text-animation-1:mp4: npx remotion render src/index.ts TextAnimation1 out/text-animation-1.mp4 --codec h264 --pixel-format yuv420p
scripts.render:text-animation-2: npx remotion render src/index.ts TextAnimation2 out/text-animation-2.webm --codec vp9 --pixel-format yuva420p
scripts.render:text-animation-2:gif: npx remotion render src/index.ts TextAnimation2 out/text-animation-2.gif --codec gif
scripts.render:text-animation-2:mp4: npx remotion render src/index.ts TextAnimation2 out/text-animation-2.mp4 --codec h264 --pixel-format yuv420p

author: andchir
